segments.text: Good morning , Madam ! Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'd like to buy a watch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , look at these two watches , aren't they lovely ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . But I think I'd prefer ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about this one ? It's graceful in style .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mm , yes , but I think I like that one better . It's made of gold , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wonder if it keeps good time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Surely . As this is the latest model , and you can also set the alarm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . this suits my taste best . I'II take It .
segments.speaker: S2
